welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Keynsham, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful countryside. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its unique charm and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Bristol Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights for passengers and cargo.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military personnel and government officials.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free with a valid boarding pass.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upavon Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
